item.title: 铜价攀升，因最高法院推翻特朗普关税令
item.description: 伦敦铜价上涨，跟随美国股市涨势。此前美国最高法院推翻了特朗普总统实施的全面互征关税政策，该政策曾对全球贸易前景造成沉重打击。【原文：Copper climbed in London, tracking gains in US stock markets after the Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s sweeping reciprocal tariffs, which have weighed heavily on the outlook for global trade.】

item.title: 先锋集团瞄准非美国市场对冲高评级债务风险
item.description: 先锋集团正将目光投向海外市场，以对冲美国投资级公司债的风险敞口。当前该市场估值偏高且预期供应增加，若经济状况意外恶化，市场极易面临重新定价的风险。【原文：Vanguard is looking at overseas markets to help hedge exposure to US investment-grade corporate debt, as elevated valuations and expectations of higher supply leave the market vulnerable to repricing if conditions unexpectedly weaken.】

item.title: 加拿大股市震荡剧烈，因特朗普关税遭推翻
item.description: 加拿大股市基准指数周五早盘短暂飙升，此前美国最高法院推翻了特朗普总统的全球关税政策。【原文：Canada’s stocks benchmark briefly spiked higher Friday morning after the US Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s global tariffs.】

item.title: 纽约面临周末后期降雪，东海岸风暴正在增强
item.description: 周末后期的一场风暴可能给美国东海岸部分地区带来降雪，纽约及新英格兰南部地区截至周一可能出现数英寸积雪。【原文：A late-weekend storm could blanket parts of the Eastern Seaboard with snow, with several inches possible in New York and southern New England through Monday.】

item.title: 美国最高法院推翻特朗普关税令，华尔街作出反应
item.description: 美国最高法院推翻了特朗普总统实施的全球性关税政策后，美国国债和彭博美元指数均出现下跌。【原文：Treasuries and a Bloomberg gauge of the dollar fell after the US Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s sweeping global tariffs.】

item.title: 最高法院撤销特朗普关税后美国国债下跌
item.description: 美国国债价格下跌，此前最高法院推翻了特朗普总统实施的全球性关税政策，该政策曾使美国今年的财政状况有所改善。【原文：Treasuries declined after the Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s sweeping global tariffs that have improved the US fiscal position this year.】

item.title: 马斯克星链套件在伊朗价格飙升，美国威胁开战
item.description: 自伊拉克战争以来美国在中东地区最大规模的部队部署，正推高伊朗境内埃隆·马斯克旗下星链终端设备的黑市价格。当地民众担忧战争可能引发全国范围内的互联网中断。【原文：The biggest US troop deployment in the Middle East since the Iraq War is sending the black market price for Elon Musk’s Starlink terminals soaring in Iran, where people fear a war would trigger another countrywide internet shutdown.】

item.title: 阿斯顿·马丁老板与自己达成的F1协议凸显转型阵痛
item.description: 在复苏势头已然枯竭之际，阿斯顿·马丁董事长劳伦斯·斯特罗尔正与自己达成交易，试图寻找转机。【原文：Looking for momentum in a turnaround that has run out of steam, Aston Martin Chairman Lawrence Stroll is making deals with himself.】

item.title: 安哥拉航空公司计划开通直飞中国航班，力求缩减亏损
item.description: 据《安哥拉日报》周五报道，安哥拉国有航空公司正研究开通首都罗安达与中国广州之间的直飞航线。【原文：Angola’s state-owned airline is studying the introduction of a direct service between the capital, Luanda, and Guangzhou in China, Jornal de Angola reported on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普全球关税遭美国最高法院叫停
item.description: 美国最高法院位于华盛顿。摄影师：格雷姆·斯隆/彭博社【原文：The US Supreme Court in Washington. Photographer: Graeme Sloan/Bloomberg】

item.title: 特朗普全球关税遭美国最高法院驳回
item.description: 美国最高法院推翻了唐纳德·特朗普总统实施的全球性关税政策，削弱了其标志性经济政策，并使其自重返白宫以来遭遇了最大的法律挫败。【原文：The US Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s sweeping global tariffs, undercutting his signature economic policy and delivering his biggest legal defeat since he returned to the White House.】

item.title: 英德拉建立流程处理与董事长交易中的冲突
item.description: Indra Sistemas SA已概述了特别董事会委员会处理潜在利益冲突的流程，因这家西班牙公司正考虑收购其董事长持有的企业。【原文：Indra Sistemas SA has outlined the process through which a special board committee will address potential conflicts of interest as the Spanish company considers acquiring a firm owned by its chairman.】

item.title: 俄罗斯抛售30万盎司黄金，金价创历史新高
item.description: 俄罗斯央行于1月抛售了其储备黄金，趁着金价攀升至历史高位之际获利。【原文：Russia’s central bank sold gold from its reserves in January, taking advantage of prices that had climbed to record highs.】

item.title: 美国2月消费者信心指数涨幅低于预期
item.description: 美国消费者信心指数2月份涨幅低于预期，原因是富裕阶层的乐观情绪被未能从股市上涨中获益人群的信心下滑所抵消。【原文：US consumer sentiment rose less than expected in February as optimism among wealthier Americans was offset by declining confidence among people who haven’t benefited from stock-market gains.】

item.title: 法国国家铁路公司考虑出售欧洲铁路物流业务股权
item.description: 知情人士透露，法国国有运输集团SNCF正考虑出售其欧洲铁路物流部门的部分股权。【原文：French state-owned transport group SNCF is considering the sale of a stake in its Rail Logistics Europe unit, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 德国光纤网络DNS:NET为债务谈判选定顾问
item.description: 德国光纤运营商DNS:NET互联网服务有限公司及其债权人已任命顾问团队筹备债务谈判，这家总部位于柏林的企业正为网络部署的资金筹措问题而苦苦挣扎。【原文：German fiber operator DNS:NET Internet Service GmbH and its creditors have appointed advisers to prepare for debt talks as the Berlin-based firm struggles to fund the roll-out of its network.】

item.title: 红杉资本印度前分支机构在投资者撤资后筹集13亿美元
item.description: 峰创资本已通过三只新基金募集13亿美元资金，这家风险投资公司计划在印度和东南亚地区投资人工智能及消费类初创企业。【原文：Peak XV Partners has raised $1.3 billion across three new funds, as the venture capital firm looks to invest in artificial intelligence and consumer startups across India and South East Asia.】

item.title: 加拿大油砂行业在2025年忙碌之后，正准备进行大规模合并
item.description: 分析师指出，加拿大石油行业正迎来一场大型合并的良机——在交易大丰收的一年之后，可供收购的小型目标企业已所剩无几。【原文：Canada’s oil patch is ripe for a mega merger, analysts say, after a bumper year for deals has left relatively few smaller targets available.】

item.title: 高盛将美国高评级债券发行规模预期上调至2.1万亿美元
item.description: 高盛集团上调了对欧美投资级债券发售量的预测，因今年债券发行开局强劲，且经济前景预期向好。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has boosted its investment-grade bond sale forecasts for the US and Europe after a strong start to the year for issuance and on expectations of a stronger economic outlook.】

item.title: 合作伙伴集团力图安抚市场对人工智能及私募信贷风险敞口的担忧
item.description: 在其他另类资产管理公司因涉足私募信贷及可能受人工智能影响的行业而股价近几周承压之际，合伙人集团控股公司试图就其投资组合传递安抚性信息。【原文：Partners Group Holding AG sought to send a calming message about its investments after the stocks of other alternative asset managers suffered in recent weeks over their exposures to private credit and to industries potentially affected by artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 巴西最大住宅开发商Cury将任命内部人士担任下一任首席执行官
item.description: 据知情人士透露，巴西一家顶级住宅开发商计划在公司创始人卸任后，从内部提拔新任首席执行官。这些人士未获授权公开发言。【原文：One of Brazil’s top homebuilders plans to name a new chief executive officer from within the company’s ranks after its namesake leader steps down, according to people familiar with the matter who were not authorized to speak publicly.】

item.title: 鸡蛋价格暴跌，曾经空荡的货架如今堆积如山
item.description: 一年前，杂货店里空空如也的鸡蛋货架，曾是顽固食品通胀的象征。消费者支付着创纪录的价格，争相突破限购数量，每当货架补货就囤积起来。【原文：A year ago, empty egg shelves in grocery stores were a symbol of stubborn food inflation. Shoppers paid record prices, scrambling to beat per-customer limits and stocking up whenever cartons appeared.】

item.title: 可可价格攀升，削减因供应过剩引发的周跌幅
item.description: 可可价格在纽约回升，扭转了此前因供应过剩导致的连续大幅周跌势。交易商暂缓采购，西非仓库中的可可豆库存持续堆积。【原文：Cocoa rose in New York, cutting another large weekly slump driven by too much supply as traders held off purchases and beans piled up in West African warehouses.】

item.title: 美国GDP增长1.4%，因政府停摆和贸易影响未达预期
item.description: 去年年底美国经济增速低于预期，主要受创纪录的政府停摆、消费者支出和贸易拖累。【原文：The US economy grew less than expected at the end of last year, dragged down by a record-long government shutdown, consumer spending and trade.】

item.title: 加拿大零售销售在2025年末放缓后有望反弹
item.description: 加拿大零售销售在第四季度仅微幅增长后，今年开年有望实现反弹。【原文：Canadian retail sales are on track to rebound to start the year after barely expanding in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 特朗普在第四季度数据公布前哀叹政府停摆对GDP的影响
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普在社交媒体发文称，去年政府停摆使美国损失了"至少两个百分点的国内生产总值"。该帖子发布时间距政府公布经通胀调整的第四季度国内生产总值变化初值不到一小时。【原文：President Donald Trump said that last year’s government shutdown cost the US “at least two points in GDP” in a social media post less than an hour before the government was expected to release the first estimate of the fourth-quarter change in inflation-adjusted gross domestic product.】

item.title: 美银称美国股市吸引全球资金比例降至2020年以来最低水平
item.description: 据美国银行的迈克尔·哈特内特称，美国股市相对于国际同行的失宠程度已达五年多来之最。【原文：US stocks haven’t been this out of favor relative to their international peers in more than five years, according to Bank of America Corp.’s Michael Hartnett.】

item.title: 意能集团新业务计划将投资重心转向美国和欧洲
item.description: 知情人士称，意大利国家电力公司(Enel SpA)预计将在下周的战略更新中提出更侧重欧洲和美国的计划，以确保稳定回报。【原文：Italy’s Enel SpA is expected to outline a stronger focus on Europe and the US in a strategy update next week in a bid to lock down steady returns, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 德国之声记者因侮辱土耳其总统被捕
item.description: 土耳其一家法院以侮辱总统雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安的罪名，正式逮捕了德国国家资助的广播机构德国之声土耳其语频道记者阿里坎·乌卢达格。【原文：A Turkish court has formally arrested Alican Uludag, a correspondent for the Turkish service of Germany’s state-funded broadcaster Deutsche Welle, on a charge of insulting President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.】

item.title: 对冲基金费马表示，巨灾债券销售激增令人瞠目结舌
item.description: 费马资本管理公司的联合创始人表示，灾难债券市场正以他前所未见的增速吸引着新发行方加入。【原文：The co-founder of Fermat Capital Management says the market for catastrophe bonds is drawing in new issuers at a rate that’s unlike anything he’s seen before.】
